purpose: Create content based on the instructions and example-output.

instructions.instruction: Write, at least 3 prompt media files
Each prompt media file should have at least 6 prompts, the prompts must be cohesive and coherent between them
Each prompt media file should be based on inspirations-directives
Decide the orientation of each file, based on orientations-directives.
Save the files under collections directory, collections/prompts/categories/art/.yaml

example-output:
